duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide routine maintenance, dispatched service and phone support.
Build positive relationships with customers by providing outstanding and excellent services.
Provide training to customers about product usage and maintenance.
Manage on-site installation, repair, and maintenance tasks in a timely manner.
Diagnose errors or technical problems and determine proper solutions.
Produce timely and detailed service reports to the customer.
Comprehend customer requirements and make appropriate recommendations.
Maintain company certifications on electro-mechanical devices, automated storage equipment, and lift equipment.
